name: @Netcraft Toolbar - Change Color for Darker Theme
description:
Look at the image "Before" and "After" below.
 
Netcraft Toolbar uses colors optimized for Firefox default theme, which is NOT suitable for darker themes.
 
This stylesheet changes image opacity and font color for darker themes.
additional_info:
